General.Name: Kambi Group PLC
General.Description: Kambi Group plc operates as a business-to-business supplier of managed sports betting services to business-to-consumer gaming operators in Europe, the Americas, and internationally. The company's services include compliance, odds-compiling, customer intelligence, and risk management services built on an in-house developed software platform. Kambi Group plc was incroporated in 2010 and is based in Birkirkara, Malta.
General.Address: 75, Quantum House, Ta' Xbiex, Malta, TBX1120
